segments.advisor_message: So, um, let’s start with some basics, okay? Could you tell me your, like, your first and last name?
segments.client_message: Yeah, sure! My name is Jonathon Smith, but I usually go by Jon.

segments.advisor_message: Great, Jon! And do you have a title, like Mr. or something? And also, uh, any other names like middle names or anything?
segments.client_message: Uh, no title really, just Jon. I don't have middle names either.
